en.name: Patience is All You Need
en.description:
Increases DMG dealt by the wearer by {{24//28//32//36//40%}}. After every attack launched by wearer, their SPD increases by {{4.8//5.6//6.4//7.2//8%}}, stacking up to 3 times.
If the wearer hits an enemy target that is not afflicted by Erode, there is a 100% base chance to inflict Erode to the target. Enemies afflicted with Erode are also considered to be Shocked and will receive Lightning DoT at the start of each turn equal to {{60//70//80//90//100%}} of the wearer's ATK, lasting for 1 turn(s).

zh.name: 只需等待
zh.description:
使装备者造成的伤害提高{{24//28//32//36//40%}}。装备者每次施放攻击后，速度提高{{4.8//5.6//6.4//7.2//8%}}，最多叠加3层。
当装备者击中敌方目标时，如果该目标不处于【游丝】状态，则有100%的基础概率使其陷入【游丝】状态。当敌方目标处于【游丝】状态时，也会被视为陷入了触电状态。【游丝】状态下，敌方目标每回合开始时受到等同于装备者{{60//70//80//90//100%}}攻击力的雷属性持续伤害，持续1回合。
